metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3805 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
object-path is vulnerable to Improperly Controlled Modification of Object Prototype Attributes ('Prototype Pollution')

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3805` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-object-path - 0.11.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-object-path package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.11.3-1ubuntu0.1').
